channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Republicans Should Squash Tax Hike Talk
item.description: Raising top marginal rates would be disastrous economic policy and bad politics.

item.title: America’s largest public utility just appointed a new CEO less than a week after Trump mysteriously fired one of its board members without explanation
item.description: Don Moul, who's served as the Tennessee Valley Authority's executive vice president and COO since 2021, will now be in charge of the utility.

item.title: Massachusetts judge charges ICE agent with contempt of court
item.description: Boston Municipal Court Judge Mark Summerville said it was "disturbing" to see ICE take a defendant into custody while he was still standing trial.

item.title: Radios and Lifelines
item.description: On the fate of U.S.-funded news agencies, broadcasting to people in dark places.

item.title: Detroit-Area Clerk Blows Whistle On ‘Years’ Of Ballot Trafficking, While AG Meets With Alleged Fraudster
item.description: The Hamtramck clerk alleged pervasive ballot trafficking in the city's elections. Meanwhile, Michigan's AG met with a fraud suspect.

item.title: SCOOP: Judge Boasberg impeachment push gains support despite House GOP leaders' resistance
item.description: A resolution to impeach U.S. District Judge James Boasberg has gained more traction in recent days.

item.title: End Federal School Food Programs
item.description: State governments are better positioned to fund and run them.

item.title: 10,000 federal health workers are getting laid off, with many discovering they lost their jobs when their security badges didn’t work: ‘Is this an April Fool’s joke?’
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announced a plan last week to remake the department.

item.title: Trump allies scrutinize Judge Boasberg's DC connections as high-stakes legal battles escalate
item.description: Judge Boasberg – who is notably overseeing two high-profile President Donald Trump lawsuits in Washington, D.C. – has come under scrutiny in recent we...

item.title: Trump Is Right to Want Open Sea Lanes
item.description: Europeans navies aren’t going to deal with the problem (they barely exist), and so it falls to us.

item.title: Sam Altman says 1 million people signed up for ChatGPT in just 60 minutes after the company launched its viral image-generation feature
item.description: The OpenAI CEO said the new feature sparked "biblical demand."

item.title: Cory Booker just pulled an all-nighter on the Senate floor, protesting Trump’s agenda for more than 14 hours straight: ‘These are not normal times’
item.description: "The threats to the American people and American democracy are grave and urgent, and we all must do more to stand against them," he said.

item.title: Trump says dozens have said they want U.N. ambassador role
item.description: President Trump said there are "a lot of good people" who want to be U.S. ambassador to the United Nations after Rep. Elise Stefanik had her name pull...

item.title: New Jersey Sen. Cory Booker launches overnight speech to protest Trump's agenda
item.description: New Jersey Democratic Sen. Cory Booker carried an all-night speech in protest of President Trump's agenda into Tuesday morning.

item.title: Why The NFL Shouldn’t Ban The ‘Brotherly Shove’

item.title: Layoffs begin at U.S. health agencies charged with tracking disease, researching and regulating food
item.description: Employees across the massive U.S. Department of Health and Human Services began receiving notices of dismissal on Tuesday in a major overhaul expected...

item.title: New GOP Legislation Would Combat CCP’s Secret Police In The U.S.
item.description: Passing this legislation is crucial for safeguarding U.S. sovereignty and countering the Chinese Communist Party's encroachment and influence efforts.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: GOP firebrand dares Dems to condemn attacks on Elon Musk's Tesla

item.title: Second COVID nursing home death's case against Cuomo tossed
item.description: A second lawsuit accusing former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and his administration of being responsible for nursing home deaths in 2020 has been dismi...

item.title: Abortion Pill Reversal Saved My Son’s Life. A Pro-Life Community Saved Mine
item.description: About seven months after reversing my chemical abortion, my son arrived. I love him more than I ever feared having him.

item.title: Not Even Elon Musk’s Money Can Buy A Kid The Benefits Of Married Parents
item.description: The biggest loser in Elon Musk’s baby mama drama is the kid whose parents think money can buy the benefits of having kids within marriage.

item.title: Shake Shack founder shares the green flags he looks for in new hires: ‘I really don’t give a damn what your IQ is’

item.title: Sorry, Mr. Vance, Things Are Not the Same as People
